{"step_by_step_thinking": "The organic component of bone refers to the living tissue that makes up the bone. It includes collagen, which is the main protein in bone. Collagen provides strength and flexibility to the bone. Noncollagenous proteins are also present in the organic component of bone, but they make up a smaller percentage compared to collagen. Therefore, the correct answer is A. 35% collagen.", "answer_choice": "A"}
